```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
```

```{r setupm, include = F}
library(mensetu)
require(tidyverse)
require(plyr)
```

# どんなデータが入っている？
```{r data show, include = F}
data = data %>% select(Y,M,Lon,Lat,CPUE,FISH,GEAR) %>% dplyr::rename(Year = Y, Month = M)
```

```{r data show2}
colnames(data)
```

# 統計量は？
```{r data show3}
summary(data)
```
# 魚種ごとのCPUEのトレンドは？
```{r data show3_2, include=F}
data2 = ddply(data, .(Year, FISH), summarize, m_CPUE = mean(CPUE))
```

```{r data show4, fig.height = 5, fig.width = 10}
cpue(data2)
```
